```{r}
library(xlsx)
library(reshape)
```

```{r}
import_data = read.xlsx(file = "access_all_import.xlsx", sheetIndex = 1, encoding = "UTF-8", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors=FALSE)

import_data$visit_code = as.numeric(import_data$Пациенты_Код.визита)
import_data$patient_code = as.integer(import_data$Пациенты_Код.пациента)

import_data = import_data[order(import_data$patient_code, import_data$Пациенты_Дата.визита),]

import_data$visit_index = NA


for (i in 1:max(import_data$patient_code)) {
  import_data$visit_index[which(import_data$patient_code == i)] = c(1:length(import_data$visit_code[which(import_data$patient_code == i)]))
}

melted = melt(import_data, id=c("patient_code","visit_index"))
casted = cast(melted, patient_code~variable+visit_index)

write.xlsx(casted, "all_reshaped.xlsx")


```
